ids.description: A comma-separated list of the artist or the user [Spotify IDs](/documentation/web-api/concepts/spotify-uris-ids). For example: `ids=74ASZWbe4lXaubB36ztrGX,08td7MxkoHQkXnWAYD8d6Q`. A maximum of 50 IDs can be sent in one request.
ids.title: Spotify IDs

b_ids.description: A JSON array of the artist or user [Spotify IDs](/documentation/web-api/concepts/spotify-uris-ids). For example: `{ids:["74ASZWbe4lXaubB36ztrGX", "08td7MxkoHQkXnWAYD8d6Q"]}`. A maximum of 50 IDs can be sent in one request. _**Note**: if the `ids` parameter is present in the query string, any IDs listed here in the body will be ignored._
